name: PONG? (game-racers)
description:
Your Dad brings home an old fashioned arcade cabinet of the game PONG and asks you to try it out.  But strange things happen after a few rounds. 

Controls: There are multiple sets of controls due to how the game progresses. The game will display the controls for you but here are the last set of controls:

I decided to skip the short story animations that I had planned so I could get the game released and reviewed by some friends. Hopefully in a few weeks I might be able to get the story added but for now, I am content with this project. 

This is a small side project where my goal was to remake an old game in 3D and from there, add some interesting twists.
